Configure Removals Data Frame

initialise_removals.Rd

Constructs a data frame representing the configuration of removals, including time, renge rates, and potential services.

Usage

initialise_removals(renege_params, p1, mu)

Arguments

renege_params

numeric; proportion (0 ≤ rm &leq; 1) of waiting patients reneging in the m-th month of waiting, where r2 = 0.1 refers to 10% of those in the second month of waiting reneging.

p1

numeric of length 1; the probability parameter for the geometric distribution (probability of failure in each period).

mu

numeric of length 1; total capacity to be applied over the geometric distribution

Value

A data frame with columns: months_waited_id, r, and service. months_waited_id is the lower bound of the number of months waited. r is the renege rate for each month waited compartment. service is the initial capacity provided, applied across the compartments using the geometric distribution defined by p1.

See also

geom_fn_s

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
set.seed(123)
renege_params <- runif(24)
initialise_removals(renege_params, p1 = 0.5, mu = 50)
} # }
